BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Test queryable built-in role synchronization (#118964) Adds more tests for built-in roles synchronization, and fixes a bug where `synchronizationInProgress` hasn't been reset properly. Resolves https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/118806
